metadata.name: "10 ETERNAL QUESTIONS" triptych
metadata.description:
Do you contemplate reincarnation and how often do you meet people whom you feel you've known all your life, or maybe even more than one?

"10 eternal questions" is a piece that not only makes you ponder about the principles of the universe, but also our role in the process of reincarnation. The idea for the art emerged as a result of communication with a neural network, which generated the eternal questions of reincarnation to which we still have no answers. A planet in the background is depicted as a symbol of eternal reincarnation.

The piece is not just a digital art but also a challenge to reflect on our role in creating the world.

How do you answer these questions to yourself?
